channel.title: Comments for page "Robo Girls"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: This time it should have been super robo team

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
O.o

That's not good. Technically it does qualify as "girl power" as you do have 3 females in one team, but I would think the greater bonus would appear above the lesser one. If this hasn't been changed yet message your sparring partner to bug report it or somethingâ€¦. unless for some reason this team was wiped.

Make sure, though, that it's the exact same allies listed here and that it's not simply a wrong message on the spar screen rather than an error in actual game mechanics of the team bonus (even if it is a sparring page error alone, you should still bug report it).

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
For some reason my sparring friend has this team but the message says:

Girl Power Bonus!
+1 Levels!
